title: Every kid I know vapes, including my own – I can’t wait till it’s banned

title: NEWS: Government set to ban disposable vapes
description: It is already illegal to sell any vape to anyone under 18, but the government said disposable vapes – often sold in smaller, more colourful packaging than refillable ones – were a “key driver behind the alarming rise in youth vaping”.

title: City of Norwich School to use sniffer dogs to stop vaping
description: One of Norfolk’s biggest schools is drafting in a sniffer dog as part of a raft of measures to curb the use of vapes amongst its pupils.
